attributes.action: Allow the Electorate to call a vote of no confidance to force a general election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To allow the electorate the ability to enforce any ruling party stand down as their actions do not benefit the Electorate and / or the ruling party have reneighed on their election promises and to force an Emergency General Election.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
